name: Learn Multiply and Divide
description: Multiply and Divide is a free app designed to help grade 1, 2 and 3 kids to master multiplication and division. With this app, they can learn how to multiply and divide number 1 to 10 while having fun.  Subjects included in the program:   Multiplication 1 - 10  Division 1 - 10  Division with leftover  Mixed operations
